title: 15 Years of Plant Time Lapse Videos
content:
This is a compilation of dozens of time lapses of plant growth, from seed to fruit in many cases. The plants featured include strawberry, avocado, tobacco, ginger, oak tree, cauliflower, potato, kiwi, and several types of mushroom (not a plant). The climbers (kiwi, peas) are so cool â€” their vines whipping around trying to find purchase. The thai basil was one of my favoritesâ€¦watching all the delicate little flowers popping out in sequence up the branches is really lovely.
